config.tdnf.title: Trees Do Not Float
config.tdnf.help.preset.physics: Trees fall easily but logs are kept intact and may damage nearby objects.
config.tdnf.help.preset.lumberjack: Axe is required. Better axes and efficiency enchantment increase breaking range. No automated farms.
config.tdnf.help.preset.progression: Axes help and better axes help more. Automated farms have a modest range.
config.tdnf.help.preset.hardcore: Axes are required, logs remain intact, ranges are reduced, leaves cost durability and automation doesn't work.
config.tdnf.help.preset.skyblock: Items are directly deposited. Ranges are modest and axes help. Automated farms work.
config.tdnf.help.fast_leaf_decay: Leaves decay instantly. Ignored (enabled) when Keep Logs Intact is true.
config.tdnf.help.keep_logs_intact: Log blocks fall to the ground instead of dropping as items. Can be laggy.
config.tdnf.help.render_falling: Renders falling logs as entities. Requires Keep Logs Intact. Client side only. Can be laggy.
config.tdnf.help.break_leaves: Falling logs break leaves and other plants on the way down.
config.tdnf.help.break_fragile: Falling logs break glass and other fragile blocks.
config.tdnf.help.active_when: Players can sneak (or not sneak) to disable mod for building.
config.tdnf.help.break_fungal_leaves: Break large fungal wart blocks and Shroomlamps.
config.tdnf.help.direct_deposit: Dropped items go directly to player inventory. Useful for skyblock packs.
config.tdnf.help.apply_fortune: Apply fortune from tool used to fell a tree. (If a tool is used)
config.tdnf.help.consume_durability: Remove durability from a tool used to fell a tree. (If a tool is used)
config.tdnf.help.leaf_durability: Tools take durability loss from leaves as well as logs. (If a tool is used)
config.tdnf.help.protect_tools: Don't break tools when using durability.
config.tdnf.help.protect_placed_blocks: Don't break blocks placed by players.
config.tdnf.help.apply_hunger: Players gain hunger from felling trees, as if they had broken each log.
config.tdnf.help.leaf_hunger: Players gain hunger from leaves in addition to logs.
config.tdnf.help.non_player_log_limit: Max logs that can be broken by non-player mechanics like pistons, fire and TNT.
config.tdnf.help.player_base_log_limit: Logs that can be broken by a player without using a tool.
config.tdnf.help.tool_tier_log_bonus: Additional logs broken when player uses a tool,  per tier of tool. Set zero to disable.
config.tdnf.help.enable_efficiency_log_m: Log breaking limit is multiplied by Efficency enchantment level.
config.tdnf.help.consolidate_drops: Consolidate item drops into stacks to prevent lag
config.tdnf.help.max_jobs_per_world: Maximum concurrent breaking tasks in each world.
config.tdnf.help.effect_level: Spawn breaking particles and play sounds? Number is max effects per second.
config.tdnf.help.max_breaks_per_second: Max log & leaf blocks to break per second
config.tdnf.help.tick_budget: Max percentage of each server tick that can be used in each world.
config.tdnf.help.max_falling_blocks: Max number of active falling block entities.
config.tdnf.help.support_surface: What counts as support for logs?
config.tdnf.help.job_timeout_seconds: Jobs taking longer than this are abandoned. Use larger values with slow breaking speeds.
